pages.text: In ancient times, villagers fought an endless battle with Disaster Villagers for the unknown power of EMCWorld that lasted for 114514 days. Unfortunately, Disaster Villagers eventually seized this power. $(br2)They will deal higher damage to players. When a player$(c) has not entered$() the one stage, their damage is increased by 18 times; $(c) has not entered$() the two stage, their damage is increased by 6 times; $(c) has not entered$() the three stage, their damage is increased by 2 times.

This magical power is also applied to their ranged attacks. $(br2)At the same time, this power constantly suppresses villagers and iron golems. Therefore, regardless of the player's stage or difficulty, the health of villagers and iron golems, and the attack power of iron golems will $(c) always $()be maintained at default values. $(br2)Treasure chests guarded by Disaster Villagers cannot be opened by players before they enter the three stage due to the influence of their powerful EMCWorld power.
